'''What Else Is He Going To Do?''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Quentin's Hunt]] on the island of [[Calamity Reef]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Quentin is not allowed to use any skills other than his Treasure Rod.</big>
